item.description:
Monthly Orgasmic Breath Journey

Fridays, 7:30-9:30pm, 10/2,* 11/13, 1/8, 2/12, 3/12, 4/9, 5/7,* 6/11, $25/class (*1st Fri, all others 2nd Fri)

Each Chakra stores the collection of our core beliefs, emotions and experiences in correlation to seven fundamental themes in our life: survival, creativity, power, love, self-expression, wisdom, and divine connection. In this dynamic meditation you will awaken your sexual/ life force energy, charge your system with creative vitality, clear and cleans each vital energy center, release past residue, expand your orgasmic range, and ignite your clarity, personal power and ability to manifest.
item.name: Monthly Orgasmic Breath Journey
